alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:08PM EDT until August 04 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR WAKULLA...SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY...SOUTHERN LEON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 1008 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Tallahassee Community College to near Carrabelle, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Panacea, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel and Tallahassee Regional A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
